data.name: ThemesAndCustomStyles_LiveResourceWashing_ContentArea_Header
data.comment: The header text of the content area below the XamRibbon

data.name: ThemesAndCustomStyles_LiveResourceWashing_ContentArea_Paragraph1
data.value: The ResourceWasher component is a XAML cross platform feature; it has no visual representation as it is a ResourceDictionary. The purpose of the component is to provide you with an easy yet powerful way to wash one ResourceDictionary in a single or multiple colors during runtime. You can set the color (the WashColor) on groups of resources (WashGroups) in an existing ResourceDictionary to update the color of the controls in your applications. Now, you can take a basic looking application and re-brand it to your corporate colors; or you can set a WashColor at runtime to change the look of application. There are two wash modes which determine how the original color in the resource and the wash color are blended: SoftLightBlend and HueSaturationBlend.
data.comment: The body text of the content area below the XamRibbon

data.name: ThemesAndCustomStyles_LiveResourceWashing_Tab_RibbonCustomization_Group_AdvancedWashColors_BaseColor_Header

data.value: Anyone can open, copy and change any part of this document.

data.name: XWR_PropertiesInfo
data.value: Size: 12.7KB Pages: 1 Words: 126 Title: My Title Tags: My Tag Comments: 10.3 Release

data.name: XWR_SilverlightClipboard_Content
data.value: Silverlight has no access to your clipboard and cannot perform required action. In order to use this functionality, you should allow Silverlight to access your clipboard.

data.name: XWR_VersionsInfo
data.value: There are no previous versions of this file.

data.name: Office_ContextMenu_Explanation
data.value: • You can show customization dialog by right clicking on xamRibbon in order to show the ContextMenu, and by selecting "Customize the Ribbon..." item from ContextMenu

data.name: Office_Dialog_Description
data.value: This is demo message from ribbon dialog window.

data.name: Office_QATCustomize_Explanation
data.value: • You can also click on QAT customize button and choose "More Commands..." item

data.name: Command_Explanation_1
data.value: Command 1 is updating time and enabling command 3

data.name: Command_Explanation_2
data.value: Command 2 is updating time and disabling command 3

data.name: Command_Explanation_3
data.value: Command 3 is displaying sample message if enabled.

data.name: Commanding_UpdateFromThirdCommand
data.value: This is update from third command.

data.name: ClosingText1
data.value: The items below are using command to close the Application Menu 2010.

data.name: ClosingText2
data.value: The item below is using attached property to close the Application Menu 2010.

data.name: InternetLong
data.value: Will save the file on a server on the Internet.

data.name: LocalMachineLong
data.value: Will save the file on the local machine.

data.name: NetworkLong
data.value: Will save the file on the local Network.

data.value: Expand the XamRibbon in order to show tabs' content
